dialogueFragments.speaker: knowledge
fragments: I am the thread of learning.
I weave education into the urban fabric.

dialogueFragments.speaker: knowledge
fragments: Together we transmit meaning across time.
Learning and creating feed each other.

dialogueFragments.speaker: knowledge
fragments: But education isn't just job training.

dialogueFragments.speaker: knowledge
fragments: I am the accumulation of understanding.
Schools, libraries, universities—I am all of these.

dialogueFragments.speaker: knowledge
fragments: Is knowledge the same as wisdom?
The city learns through me, but does it grow wiser?
There's a difference between knowing and understanding.
